nodes.text: The Tinuvian tar pits were a natural phenomenon, situated on a planet in the Tinuvia system. They were a subject of a popular phrase, "as if he/she had been dragged through a Tinuvian tar pit", referring to their currently bedraggled state.
The Tinuvian tar pits were created by author R. A. Salvatore for his 1999 novel The New Jedi Order: Vector Prime, in which they receive a brief mention.
